title: Define project requirements
description: Gather and document all the necessary requirements for the suiviAirPortable device.

title: Design the hardware architecture
description: Design the physical structure and components required for the suiviAirPortable device.

title: Develop the firmware for air quality sensors
description: Design and implement the firmware to interface with the air quality sensors.

title: Develop the mobile application UI/UX
description: Design and implement the user interface for the mobile application.

title: Develop the mobile application backend
description: Implement the server-side logic for the mobile application.

title: Integrate the firmware with the mobile application backend
description: Integrate the firmware communication with the mobile application backend.
dependencies: Develop the firmware for air quality sensors

title: Test the suiviAirPortable device
description: Perform tests on the physical device and its software components to ensure proper functionality.
dependencies: Integrate the firmware with the mobile application backend

title: Document technical specifications
description: Create a comprehensive document detailing the technical aspects of the suiviAirPortable device.
dependencies: Develop the firmware for air quality sensors
Integrate the firmware with the mobile application backend
